body.name: COOLHOOD Portable Monitor 15.6'', 1080P FHD Plug&Play Travel Laptop Monitor w/Smart Cover, USB-C HDR Portable Second Computer Display, Portable Game External Screen for PC Phone Mac Xbox PS4/5 Switch
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tuesday, February 13. Order within 4 hrs 32 mins
Or fastest pickup Tomorrow, February 12. Order within 4 hrs 17 mins
features: 𝟏𝟎𝟖𝟎𝐏 𝐅𝐇𝐃 𝐈𝐏𝐒 𝐒𝐜𝐫𝐞𝐞𝐧: This 15.6" portable monitor will offer you more vivid colors and crisp images with a stunning 1920x1080 resolution. With the 2000:1 contrast ratio, 100% sRGB color gamut, and 178° viewing angle, you'll have a truly immersive viewing experience. Eye-care technology(Blue Light Reduction) also helps keep your eyes from getting tired during prolonged use.

𝐖𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐂𝐨𝐦𝐩𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐛𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐲: Thanks to a USB Type C port and one mini HDMI port, this portable screen can be connected to a variety of devices such as PCs, laptops, phones, and gaming devices like Switch, Xbox, PS4, and so on. Please note that if your device's USB type C port is not USB 3.1 or Thunderbolt 3, then this USB C port will charge power ONLY without transmitting any signal.

𝐇𝐚𝐧𝐝𝐲 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐓𝐫𝐚𝐯𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐧𝐠: Lightweight and thin this travel monitor is easy for traveling professionals and plug and play makes it easy to put wherever you want. No need to install any extra drivers. While 13.3 inches may be too small, this 15.6 inch will make a huge difference for working on Excel, etc.

𝐁𝐮𝐢𝐥𝐭-𝐢𝐧 𝐒𝐩𝐞𝐚𝐤𝐞𝐫𝐬 & 𝐌𝐮𝐥𝐭𝐢𝐩𝐥𝐞 𝐃𝐢𝐬𝐩𝐥𝐚𝐲 𝐌𝐨𝐝𝐞𝐬: There are also three display modes you can use with this 15.6" portable display: Duplicate mode, extend mode, and second screen mode. There are two built-in dual stereo speakers that provide an immersive experience when you're listening to music, watching movies, playing games, and so on. The 3.5mm audio output can also be used to connect to an outer speaker for a better audio experience.

𝐒𝐦𝐚𝐫𝐭 𝐂𝐚𝐬𝐞: The smart case made of PU magnetic material keeps the screen safe from scratches and it also doubles as a stand for the monitor at the same time. There are two grooves in the cover base to give at least some choice of viewing angle for your comfort. And the 24/7 professional support team.

Does this monitor have touch function? No, this 15.6 inch portable display doesn't support touch. My laptop and monitor are connected with a type c to type c cable, showing "No Signal" , how can i solve it? The usb type c interface needs to support Thunderbolt 3. Please confirm whether your laptop supports Thunderbolt 3. Otherwise your laptop can't transmit signal via usb c to usb C cable. Besides tuming on or off the monitor, what's the function of the "Power" button? 1.OSD Menu: press the "Power" button once 2.Confirm 3.Turn On/Turn Off: You can press the“Power" button for 4 seconds to turn on/off the monitor. 4.Back/Exit: Press the“Power”button for 2 seconds. I can't save the settings | made in the OSD menu, is this normal? If only Type-C connection is used, the power-saving mode will automatically turn on and no settings will be saved. If you need to save the settings, please provide separate power supply for the monitor.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’ve used several portable monitors but this one has the best case I’ve seen. Screen resolution is fantastic. Love being able to work with two screens from wherever.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 3, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Bought for my husband
reviews.reviewText: This is great for travel working in a hotel or visiting out of town family. Having a duel monitor makes working from anywhere so much better, it's easy to set up, light weight to carry and fits in with his laptop in his backpack. My husband is always on call and needs his computer with duel monitors with quick set up.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars for the price, this is a nice, clear, bright monitor.
reviews.reviewText: This is my second travel monitor, and I bought it to be bigger than the last. Surprisingly, it's also brighter than the last. I haven't tried gaming on it, but for working/browsing, it's great. I've even watched TV on it, also quite good. Plus, the menu is much easier to use than my last one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Very pleased with this monitor. Display settings are great, screen quality is excellent, numerous cords and outlet plugs huge plus. Perfect size.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars This is not VESA Mountable! It only has two holes, and they aren't real holes!
reviews.reviewText: This product claims to be VESA mountable, but it only comes with two shallow dip like holes in the back towards the bottom, not mountable. I guess that's the catch on the price. Just be aware it's only portable and not mountable despite what it says.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars To Travel Far & Wide
reviews.reviewText: I got this because I travel quite frequently for work. This screen fits in my backpack and is super light. It’s also a good size for less eye strain as I do a lot of reading on-screen. This screen makes my corporate life so much easier because now I can travel with that extra screen I always need.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works great with chromebook
reviews.reviewText: I use this for presentations, the only thing to keep in mind if you power the screen off of your laptop is it does use quite a bit of battery. There is a power cord though, so not much of an issue.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to set up
reviews.reviewText: This was easy to set up and works great as a second monitor for my laptop.
